text: 13:7 Daniel 7:21; Akar Mogomem 11:7; 11:18; 12:17; 17:15Ezɨ God an amamangatɨzɨma, a Godɨn gumazamiziba ko mɨdorozim gamua, egha me abɨra. God gavgavir ekiam a ganɨngi, ezɨ an anababa bar dar gumazamiziba, ko mɨkarzir igharagha gariba bar, ko vaghvagha nguibabar akabav geir gumazamiziba, ko kantriba bar dar gumazamiziba, a me gativaghamin gavgavim iti.
